attributes.action: Death penalty for anyone group / individual committing murder in the uk
attributes.additional_details:
In light or the recent terror attacks in other parts of the world, and then today in the streets of South London there must be an ultimate punishment to stop these terrorist’s on main land UK.
And not just lock them up in prison for life at the tax payers’ expense where the families and friends can visit,
The only place the victims can go to see their loved ones who have been hurt/killed by these terrorist is the graveyard.
